ADAPTED.Name: Adapted
ADAPTED.Description: Powers up moves of the same type by 33%.

AERILATE.Name: Aerilate
AERILATE.Description: Normal-type moves become Flying-type and power up by 30%.

ANALYTIC.Name: Analytic
ANALYTIC.Description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last by 30%.

ARENATRAP.Name: Arena Trap
ARENATRAP.Description: Prevents the foe from fleeing unless it is airborne.

ASONEGHOST.Name: As One
ASONEGHOST.Description: Possesses two Abilities: Unnerve and Grim Neigh.

ASONEICE.Name: As One
ASONEICE.Description: Possesses two Abilities: Unnerve and Chilling Neigh.

AURABREAK.Name: Aura Break
AURABREAK.Description: Reverses "Aura" Abilities to weaken affected moves.

BADDREAMS.Name: Bad Dreams
BADDREAMS.Description: Reduces a sleeping foe's HP by 1/8 at the end of a round.

BATTERY.Name: Battery
BATTERY.Description: Powers up ally Pokémon's special moves by 30%.

BERSERK.Name: Berserk
BERSERK.Description: Raises Atk and Sp. Atk by two steps each when its HP is lowered below half.

CHEEKPOUCH.Name: Cheek Pouch
CHEEKPOUCH.Description: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it restores 33% of its max health.

CHILLINGNEIGH.Name: Chilling Neigh
CHILLINGNEIGH.Description: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

CHLOROPHYLL.Name: Chlorophyll
CHLOROPHYLL.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

CLEARBODY.Name: Clear Body
CLEARBODY.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

COMATOSE.Name: Comatose
COMATOSE.Description: It's always drowsing, and attacks without waking.

COMPETITIVE.Name: Competitive
COMPETITIVE.Description: Raises Sp. Atk by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

CONTRARY.Name: Contrary
CONTRARY.Description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

CORROSION.Name: Corrosion
CORROSION.Description: Can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.

COTTONDOWN.Name: Cotton Down
COTTONDOWN.Description: Lowers everyone else's Speed by two steps when hit by an attack.

CUDCHEW.Name: Cud Chew
CUDCHEW.Description: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

CURIOUSMEDICINE.Name: Curious Medicine
CURIOUSMEDICINE.Description: Upon entry, clears the stat changes of other Pokémon.

DANCER.Name: Dancer
DANCER.Description: Repeats another Pokémon's dance move immediately.

DARKAURA.Name: Dark Aura
DARKAURA.Description: Powers up each Pokémon's Dark-type moves.

DAUNTLESSSHIELD.Name: Dauntless Shield
DAUNTLESSSHIELD.Description: Raises Defense when the Pokémon enters a battle.

DEFEATIST.Name: Defeatist
DEFEATIST.Description: Halves move damage when HP becomes half or less.

DEFIANT.Name: Defiant
DEFIANT.Description: Raises Attack by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

DELTASTREAM.Name: Delta Stream
DELTASTREAM.Description: Changes the weather to Strong Winds, which remove Flying-type's weaknesses. Lingers for 3 turns after leaving.

DESOLATELAND.Name: Desolate Land
DESOLATELAND.Description: Changes the weather to Harsh Sunlight, which nullifies Water-type moves. Lingers for 3 turns after leaving.

DISGUISE.Name: Disguise
DISGUISE.Description: Its shroud protects it from an attack just once.

DOWNLOAD.Name: Download
DOWNLOAD.Description: Boosts one Attacking stat by two steps according to the foe's defenses.

DRIZZLE.Name: Drizzle
DRIZZLE.Description: Summons rain for 4 turns when it enters battle.

DROUGHT.Name: Drought
DROUGHT.Description: Turns the weather to sunshine for 4 turns when it enters battle.

DRYSKIN.Name: Dry Skin
DRYSKIN.Description: Restores 1/8 HP in rain, 1/4 when hit by Water-type moves. Loses 1/8 in sunshine, takes 25% more from Fire-type moves.

EMERGENCYEXIT.Name: Emergency Exit
EMERGENCYEXIT.Description: Switches out if its HP becomes half or less.

FAIRYAURA.Name: Fairy Aura
FAIRYAURA.Description: Powers up each Pokémon's Fairy-type moves.

FILTER.Name: Filter
FILTER.Description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks by 25%.

FLAMEBODY.Name: Flame Body
FLAMEBODY.Description: Physical moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to burn the attacker.

FLOWERGIFT.Name: Flower Gift
FLOWERGIFT.Description: In sunshine boosts its and allies' Attack and Sp. Def by 50%.

FLOWERVEIL.Name: Flower Veil
FLOWERVEIL.Description: Protects Grass-type allies from status conditions or stat lowering by enemies.

FLUFFY.Name: Fluffy
FLUFFY.Description: Doubles Defense. The Pokémon takes double damage from Fire-type moves.

FRIENDGUARD.Name: Friend Guard
FRIENDGUARD.Description: Reduces damage done to allies by 25%.

FULLMETALBODY.Name: Full Metal Body
FULLMETALBODY.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

GALEWINGS.Name: Gale Wings
GALEWINGS.Description: Doubles the speed of Flying-type moves.

GALVANIZE.Name: Galvanize
GALVANIZE.Description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type and power up by 30%.

GLUTTONY.Name: Gluttony
GLUTTONY.Description: Eats pinch berries earlier than normal.

GOOEY.Name: Gooey
GOOEY.Description: Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed and Attack.

GORILLATACTICS.Name: Gorilla Tactics
GORILLATACTICS.Description: Boosts Attack by 50% but the user is locked into the first move they use.

GRIMNEIGH.Name: Grim Neigh
GRIMNEIGH.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk after knocking out any Pokémon.

GULPMISSILE.Name: Gulp Missile
GULPMISSILE.Description: Attacks with prey caught when using Surf, Dive, or Depth Charge.

HEALER.Name: Healer
HEALER.Description: Heals ally's status conditions at the end of turn.

HONEYGATHER.Name: Honey Gather
HONEYGATHER.Description: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

HUNGERSWITCH.Name: Hunger Switch
HUNGERSWITCH.Description: It alternates between an Electric-type Mode and a Dark-type Mode.

HUSTLE.Name: Hustle
HUSTLE.Description: Boosts move damage by 50%, but lowers accuracy by 20%.

HYDRATION.Name: Hydration
HYDRATION.Description: Heals status problems each turn if it is raining.

ICEBODY.Name: Ice Body
ICEBODY.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn in a hailstorm.

ILLUSION.Name: Illusion
ILLUSION.Description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

IMPOSTER.Name: Imposter
IMPOSTER.Description: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

INFILTRATOR.Name: Infiltrator
INFILTRATOR.Description: Ignores screens and other barriers, Substitute, and boosted defensive stats.

INNARDSOUT.Name: Innards Out
INNARDSOUT.Description: Damages an attacker that lands the finishing hit.

INNERFOCUS.Name: Inner Focus
INNERFOCUS.Description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.

INTIMIDATE.Name: Intimidate
INTIMIDATE.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

INTREPIDSWORD.Name: Intrepid Sword
INTREPIDSWORD.Description: Raises Attack when the Pokémon enters a battle.

IRONBARBS.Name: Iron Barbs
IRONBARBS.Description: Physical moves against it inflict 1/8th max HP damage to the foe.

IRONFIST.Name: Iron Fist
IRONFIST.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 30%.

LEAFGUARD.Name: Leaf Guard
LEAFGUARD.Description: Immune to status conditions while in sunshine.

LEVITATE.Name: Levitate
LEVITATE.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

MAGICBOUNCE.Name: Magic Bounce
MAGICBOUNCE.Description: Reflects enemy status moves that target the Pokémon or create hazards around it.

MAGICGUARD.Name: Magic Guard
MAGICGUARD.Description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

MAGICIAN.Name: Magician
MAGICIAN.Description: Steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits.

MEGALAUNCHER.Name: Mega Launcher
MEGALAUNCHER.Description: Boosts the power of pulse moves by 50%.

MERCILESS.Name: Merciless
MERCILESS.Description: Its attacks are critical against poisoned targets.

MOODY.Name: Moody
MOODY.Description: Raises one attacking or defending stat by three steps and lowers another by 1 at the end of each turn.

MOTORDRIVE.Name: Motor Drive
MOTORDRIVE.Description: Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Speed when hit by one.

MOXIE.Name: Moxie
MOXIE.Description: Raises Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

MULTISCALE.Name: Multiscale
MULTISCALE.Description: Reduces move damage taken by 50% when HP is full.

MULTITYPE.Name: Multitype
MULTITYPE.Description: Changes type to match the held Plate.

MUMMY.Name: Mummy
MUMMY.Description: Physical moves against the Pokémon spread this Ability.

NATURALCURE.Name: Natural Cure
NATURALCURE.Description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

NEUTRALIZINGGAS.Name: Neutralizing Gas
NEUTRALIZINGGAS.Description: Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

NOGUARD.Name: No Guard
NOGUARD.Description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

NORMALIZE.Name: Normalize
NORMALIZE.Description: Non-Normal moves become Normal-type and are powered up by 50%.

PARENTALBOND.Name: Parental Bond
PARENTALBOND.Description: Child attacks after the parent, for 25% of the previous damage.

PERISHBODY.Name: Perish Body
PERISHBODY.Description: When it takes a hit, both Pokémon faint after 3 turns.

PICKPOCKET.Name: Pickpocket
PICKPOCKET.Description: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

POISONPOINT.Name: Poison Point
POISONPOINT.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to poison the attacker.

POISONTOUCH.Name: Poison Touch
POISONTOUCH.Description: Physical moves have a 30% chance to poison targets.

POWERCONSTRUCT.Name: Power Construct
POWERCONSTRUCT.Description: Changes with other Cells if HP becomes half or less.

POWEROFALCHEMY.Name: Power of Alchemy
POWEROFALCHEMY.Description: When an ally faints, the Pokémon also gains their ability or abilities.

POWERSPOT.Name: Power Spot
POWERSPOT.Description: Powers up nearby allies moves by 30%.

PRANKSTER.Name: Prankster
PRANKSTER.Description: Gives priority to status moves, but makes Dark-types immune to them.

PRESSURE.Name: Pressure
PRESSURE.Description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

PRIMORDIALSEA.Name: Primordial Sea
PRIMORDIALSEA.Description: Changes the weather to Heavy Rain, which nullifies Fire-type moves. Lingers for 3 turns after leaving.

PROTEAN.Name: Protean
PROTEAN.Description: It changes type to that of the move it's about to use.

PUREFORCE.Name: Pure Force
PUREFORCE.Description: Raises the Pokémon's Attack by 50%, including Style Values and other bonuses.

RAINDISH.Name: Rain Dish
RAINDISH.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in rain.

RECKLESS.Name: Reckless
RECKLESS.Description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage by 30%.

REGENERATOR.Name: Regenerator
REGENERATOR.Description: Restores 25% of max HP when withdrawn from battle.

RIPEN.Name: Ripen
RIPEN.Description: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

RKSSYSTEM.Name: RKS System
RKSSYSTEM.Description: Its type matches the memory disc it holds.

ROCKHEAD.Name: Rock Head
ROCKHEAD.Description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

ROUGHSKIN.Name: Rough Skin
ROUGHSKIN.Description: Physical moves against it inflict 1/8th max HP damage to the foe.

ROYALMAJESTY.Name: Royal Majesty
ROYALMAJESTY.Description: Makes foes unable to use priority attacks.

SANDPOWER.Name: Sand Power
SANDPOWER.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in sandstorm.

SANDRUSH.Name: Sand Rush
SANDRUSH.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

SANDSHROUD.Name: Sand Shroud
SANDSHROUD.Description: Takes 25% less damage in a sandstorm.

SANDSTREAM.Name: Sand Stream
SANDSTREAM.Description: Summons a sandstorm for 4 turns when it enters battle.

SAPSIPPER.Name: Sap Sipper
SAPSIPPER.Description: Immune to Grass-type moves, and raises both attacking stats when hit by one.

SCHOOLING.Name: Schooling
SCHOOLING.Description: Forms a powerful school while it has a lot of HP.

SCREENCLEANER.Name: Screen Cleaner
SCREENCLEANER.Description: Screens are nullified when entering battle.

SERENEGRACE.Name: Serene Grace
SERENEGRACE.Description: Doubles the likelihood of the user's random added effects activating.

SHADOWSHIELD.Name: Shadow Shield
SHADOWSHIELD.Description: Resists damage while its HP is full.

SHARPNESS.Name: Sharpness
SHARPNESS.Description: Boosts the power of blade moves by 50%.

SHEDSKIN.Name: Shed Skin
SHEDSKIN.Description: Heals from burn, frostbite, poison, numb, or leech at end of turn.

SHEERFORCE.Name: Sheer Force
SHEERFORCE.Description: Removes random added effects of attacks to increase their damage by 30%.

SHIELDDUST.Name: Shield Dust
SHIELDDUST.Description: Blocks all random added effects of attacks taken.

SHIELDSDOWN.Name: Shields Down
SHIELDSDOWN.Description: It can't be statused while it has its shell. Below half HP its shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

SIMPLE.Name: Simple
SIMPLE.Description: Stat changes in the Pokemon are doubled.

SKILLLINK.Name: Skill Link
SKILLLINK.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves.

SLOWSTART.Name: Slow Start
SLOWSTART.Description: Halves Attack and Speed for 3 turns.

SLUSHRUSH.Name: Slush Rush
SLUSHRUSH.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

SNIPER.Name: Sniper
SNIPER.Description: Doubles critical hit chance. Powers up critical hits by another 50%.

SNOWWARNING.Name: Snow Warning
SNOWWARNING.Description: Summons a hailstorm for 4 turns when it enters battle.

SOLARPOWER.Name: Solar Power
SOLARPOWER.Description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

SOLIDROCK.Name: Solid Rock
SOLIDROCK.Description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks by 25%.

SOULHEART.Name: Soul-Heart
SOULHEART.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk each time a Pokémon faints.

SPEEDBOOST.Name: Speed Boost
SPEEDBOOST.Description: Speed is raised by two steps at the end of each of its turns.

STALWART.Name: Stalwart
STALWART.Description: Ignores effects changing the target of a move.

STAMINA.Name: Stamina
STAMINA.Description: Boosts Defense by two steps when hit by an attack.

STANCECHANGE.Name: Stance Change
STANCECHANGE.Description: Changes between Blade and Shield Forme with attacks and King's Shield.

STATIC.Name: Static
STATIC.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon has a 30% chance to cause numbing.

STEELYSPIRIT.Name: Steely Spirit
STEELYSPIRIT.Description: Powers up Steel-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.

STENCH.Name: Stench
STENCH.Description: Attacks have a 50% chance to cause the target to flinch.

STRONGJAW.Name: Strong Jaw
STRONGJAW.Description: Boosts the power of biting moves by 50%.

STURDY.Name: Sturdy
STURDY.Description: It can't be knocked out with one hit.

SUPERLUCK.Name: Super Luck
SUPERLUCK.Description: Four times more likely for moves to be critical.

SWIFTSWIM.Name: Swift Swim
SWIFTSWIM.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

SYNCHRONIZE.Name: Synchronize
SYNCHRONIZE.Description: When the Pokémon is given a status condition by another Pokémon, they also get that condition.

TANGLINGHAIR.Name: Tangling Hair
TANGLINGHAIR.Description: Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed by three steps.

TECHNICIAN.Name: Technician
TECHNICIAN.Description: Moves with base power 60 or less deal 50% more damage.

TELEPATHY.Name: Telepathy
TELEPATHY.Description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

THICKFAT.Name: Thick Fat
THICKFAT.Description: Takes half damage from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

TINTEDLENS.Name: Tinted Lens
TINTEDLENS.Description: Doubles the damage of "not very effective" moves.

TRIAGE.Name: Triage
TRIAGE.Description: Gives +3 priority to healing and draining moves.

TRUANT.Name: Truant
TRUANT.Description: Every other turn, the Pokémon can't use any move but Slack Off.

UNAWARE.Name: Unaware
UNAWARE.Description: Ignores defensive stat changes in opponents it's hitting, and offensive stat stages in foes hitting it.

UNBURDEN.Name: Unburden
UNBURDEN.Description: Raises Speed if a held item is consumed in battle.

UNSEENFIST.Name: Unseen Fist
UNSEENFIST.Description: Physical moves negate all protection effects.

VICTORYSTAR.Name: Victory Star
VICTORYSTAR.Description: Doubles the accuracy of its allies and itself.

VITALSPIRIT.Name: Vital Spirit
VITALSPIRIT.Description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

VOLTABSORB.Name: Volt Absorb
VOLTABSORB.Description: Immune to Electric-type moves and restores HP when hit by one.

WANDERINGSPIRIT.Name: Wandering Spirit
WANDERINGSPIRIT.Description: Taking a physical hit exchanges Abilities.

WATERABSORB.Name: Water Absorb
WATERABSORB.Description: Immune to Water-type moves and restores HP when hit by one.

WATERBUBBLE.Name: Water Bubble
WATERBUBBLE.Description: Weakens incoming Fire-type moves, and doubles Water-type damage.

WEAKARMOR.Name: Weak Armor
WEAKARMOR.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon raise its Speed by two steps but lower its Defense.

WHITESMOKE.Name: White Smoke
WHITESMOKE.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

WIMPOUT.Name: Wimp Out
WIMPOUT.Description: Cowardly switches out if its HP becomes half or less.
